languages.string: Evolution is only available in the full version. Download?
The virus copied to the clipboard
The virus added from the clipboard
Are you sure you want to delete a virus "{0}"?
Are you sure you want to finish the battle?
The battle dragged on...\nDeclare a draw?
Are you sure you want to quit?
In natural selection the virus has won:
Natural selection has not recognized any winner...
Field to enter the name of the author
Field to enter the name of the virus
Field for password entry. The password is required to protect the genes configuration from being viewed by other players
Replication - parameter that controls the population growth rate
Defense - controls the reduction of physical damage
Agility - controls the increase of critical hit chance and impacts the order of the attack
Power - controls the amplification of characteristics of all genes
Vampirism - controls the recovery of health at the expense of attacks
Reflection - controls the reflection of damage to the attacker
Regeneration - controls the health recovery throughout the time the battle lasts
Toxin - controls the gradual decrease of health, up to death or until the effect action ends
Stun - controls the probability and duration of stunning. The stun interrupts all actions of the attacked player for the time the stunning lasts
Speed - controls the moving speed on the map
Migration - controls the activity of moving on the map
Homeostasis - controls the unity or separateness during the moving
Aggression - controls the entering the battle or putting-off of joining the battle
First you must create a virus. Press "Create virus" button to proceed to Laboratory.
Using sliders, change the virus DNA and distribute genes between the chromosomes.
You must distribute 128 genes, between 10 combat characteristics and to set the values for 4 behavioural characteristics.
Besides, feel free to edit, copy, clone or delete viruses, for this purpose press and hold the virus button.
Now arrange the battle between viruses. To do this, select two of the virus by clicking on them and click "Fight".
